main event: A multiple sighting of three bright objects in the sky occurred on July 31, 1960, in Los Angeles, California.
interesting points: The objects had a flat top and sides with a bright light that appeared green in the center., They were observed hovering for 3-4 minutes before disappearing over the horizon., Observers from Griffith Observatory also reported seeing the objects., The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes in total., The official conclusion was that the object was a meteor, though the witnesses' impressions suggested otherwise.
witness description: Civilian witnesses reported the sighting, with one case investigated that involved binocular observations.
